instructions: Updated primary and secondary colors
Refined background and accent shades for better contrast
Improved responsiveness for mobile devices
Adjusted layout and spacing for smaller screens
Added lyrics section to my music
Added embedded youtube player
Search bar is now only present in album view and works
Added sorting to album page
Added animations to home view
Added band section to admin page
Fixed some things on portfolio page
Fixed routing issue in vercel
Ported text part of database to firebase
Made an admin page for adding more albums
Small changes to components
Added a page to view albums individually and their tracklist, data is still incomplete
Changed up the home screen to make it more lively
Sent updates to /about instead of home (could revert in the future)
Added a basic layout for the my music section
Added animations to Bands and All Albums
Added social links at the bottom of the page

description: Added a lot of stuff and made changes to the UI
instructions: The navigation bar is now a floating bar
